<!-- Please follow this template to ensure your PR is clear and easy to review. This helps maintainers understand the intention quickly. -->

### PR Intention
What does this PR accomplish? (e.g., "Fixes bug in user authentication" or "Adds new feature for profile editing"). Link to related issues with #issue-number.

### Description of Changes
- Bullet point summary of key changes.
- Explain why these changes are needed.

### Related Issues
- Fixes # [issue number]
- References # [another issue]

### Testing
- How did you test this? (e.g., "Ran unit tests" or "Manual testing on local dev server").
- Any edge cases considered?

### Checklist
- [ ] Code follows style guidelines.
- [ ] Tests pass.
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable).
- [ ] No breaking changes.
